item.description:
There will be a great event taking place on Oct 29& 30 at The World Trade Center in Boston. It is called
The New England Boomers and Seniors Expo. If any of you went to the AARP Convention in Boston 3 years ago. This sound to be quite similar. People can car pool if they like. This is a difficult thing to put up as a Meetup event, however people can decide to car pool and go together.

Scroll down the menu on the left of the home page for more details.

http://www.boomersandseniorsexpo.com./
item.name: New England Boomer and Seniors Expo
